word_mean: 利己主义，唯我主义：自负，自私，自我中心，夸大个人的重要性，对自己评价过高

sentence.Network_en: He was kindly and good - natured for all his egotism.
sentence.Network_cn: 他尽管一心想着自己,但是他和气,善良,心眼好.

sentence.Network_en: What Jeanie least liked in the tone of the letter was a smothered degree of egotism.
sentence.Network_cn: 珍妮最不高兴的是信中隐约可见的唯我独尊的口吻.

sentence.Network_en: His egotism had never taken the crude form of desiring a dull wife.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的利己主义从来没有表现为一种粗俗的形式,满足于得到一个百依百顺的妻子.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE 同义词总结大全 ... thrasonical adj 自负的，吹牛的 egotism n 自我中心癖,自负 | arrogant adj． 傲慢的，自大的.
研究：姓氏可影响职业选择-英语点津 ... implicit: 内含的；含蓄的 egotism: 自我中心 come across: 偶然碰到或发现.
这个名词往往与自我主义(egotism)和自利自私连在一起。但是，我们现在所说的个人主义与自我主义及自利自私并无必然的关联。
若不小心处理，这会直接演变成唯我主义(Egotism) ── 自私自利、自尊自大。世人的思想充满贪欲、妒忌与傲慢。

list.abs: ...经验上或事实上的对立面相互联系,这即是革命的这种大仁大义、公私相合一的想像恰与社会上实际的人性,即“利益的自我中心作风”(the egotism of interests)相对立;“革命之积极分子”所宣扬的普遍原则及其行动者(或代理)乃体现社会的整体,而这个整体是不会有分.

list.exp: 令人信服的志气和自负
list.abs: 强制的;引人注目的;非常有说服力的释 1.forceful 2.demanding attention 3.convincing 例 compelling ambition and egotism 令人信服的志气和自负 complacence〔k〔.
these are diverse forms of egotism , but it is egotism all the same ., 那是自私自利的不同形式 , 但是总还是自私自利!
易感受到「自我威胁」（threatened egotism），而倾向对于负向回馈的提供者

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from French égoïste, from Latin ego 'I'

entry.tran: 自我中心;利己主义;自私自利
entry.def: Egotism is the quality of being egotistic.

means.word_mean: 1. an exaggerated opinion of your own importance
2. an inflated feeling of pride in your superiority to others

auth_sentence.content: Many will think his egotism and self-regard disagreeable.
auth_sentence.res_content: Many will think his egotism and self-regard disagreeable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Many will think his egotism and self-regard disagreeable.

auth_sentence.content: Intense selfishness, the alcohol of egotism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Intense selfishness, the alcohol of egotism.

auth_sentence.content: "Generosity is the purest form of egotism," he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: "Generosity is the purest form of egotism," he said.
